mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(partition by noticeKind order by noticeNo desc) as row_num, b.*from (select notice_No as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_date as noticeDate, notice_kind as noticeKind, notice_read_count as noticeReadCount from notice_tbl order by 1 desc)b) where noticeKind=0 and row_num between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from notice_tbl where notice_kind=0
select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_date as noticeDate from notice_tbl where notice_no=#{_parameter}
select file_no as fileNo, ref_no as noticeNo, filename, filepath from file_tbl where ref_no = #{noticeNo}
